TopicTitle: The LANBox - Oberth Kuiper Manoeuvre Stream

Articles.Content:
Hi all!

Another LANBox KSP stream is starting in 10 minutes. This week we will performing maneuvers similar to the Oberth Kuiper Manoeuvre from Mondays XKCD.

Again you can join the stream at The LANBox Live, as well as on our teamspeak the details of which can be found here

Hope to see you there!
